definition: a person who looks drenched and bedraggled/like a drowned rat/deep distress
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: I had to cycle home in the rain and came in looking like a downed rat.
sentences.chinese: 我只能冒雨騎車回家，進門的時候溼得像一隻落湯雞。

sentences.english: In the middle of the picnic, it started to rain buckets and everybody got soaked.
sentences.chinese: 野餐時突然大雨滂沱，人人淋得像落湯雞一樣。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, Tom was caught in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 真不幸，湯姆在雨中被淋成了落湯雞。

sentences.english: It was raining dogs and cats when he came home, so he looked like a drowned rat.
sentences.chinese: 他回來時正下着瓢潑大雨，所以他看上去像個落湯雞。

sentences.english: My goodness, you're soaked through. Where's your car?
sentences.chinese: 天哪，你都成落湯雞了。你的車呢？

sentences.english: He forgot the umbrella this morning and was caught in the rain like a drowned rat.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上他忘記帶雨傘了，被淋得像落湯雞似的。

sentences.english: He was wet all over like a drowned rat.
sentences.chinese: 他渾身溼得像只落湯雞。

sentences.english: She came in from the storm looking like a drowned rat.
sentences.chinese: 她冒着暴雨來，淋得像落湯雞。

sentences.english: But those whose families have lived here for generations prefer getting soaked.
sentences.chinese: 但那些祖上很早就住在英國的人，卻寧願變成落湯雞。

definition: half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
lit. 300 silver taels not hidden here (idiom); fig. to reveal what one intends to hide
pinyin: ci3 di4 wu2 yin2 san1 bai3 liang3

definition: lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
to steal the show/to grab the limelight
(slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
